front.title: Carrying DHCP options over Neighbor Discovery Messages

abstract.t: DHCP options are used to convey network and host configurationinformation to the hosts attached to a network. Some networks maywish to configure their routers to advertise these same pieces ofinformation, and might use IPv6 Router Advertisements do distributethese parameters. This document defines a generic neighbor discoveryoption for carrying DHCP options. This option is carried over IPv6Router Advertisements.
